entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -43.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
